channel.title: Coolest Mods
channel.description: What are some of the coolest mods that you have played/made for the Source or GoldSrc Engine? I liked Research and Development for HL2:EP2.

item.title: Coolest Mods
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
Omega_Absolute:

You should know that a REAL bullet in REAL LIFE begins to drastically drop off and decrease momentum after about 100 yards. Valve can’t program every bullet to behave like the crossbow bolt as it would be too pc heavy. Considering you were talking about how “realistic” iron sights are, you should be happy that the guns behave the way they do in HL2.

lrn2shoot

Tell me about it. Any time a gun is given slightly authentic accuracy they blame the programming instead of their sheer lack of skill and hand-eye-coordination.

Read full topic

item.title: Coolest Mods
item.dc:creator: rorriMAesU
item.description:
lol fair enough

Sorry…I do not ask for his criticisms, but want to respond nonetheless. I am interested in hearing about other mods and only tried to contribute with some detail, next time I won’t give my insights.

item.title: Coolest Mods
item.dc:creator: Ballsopt
item.description:
rorriMAesU:

From what I remember, the crossbow in HL projected similar ammo and had a significant zoom. I’d say that’s similar enough, but that is my opinion.

lol no

besides, Cinematic mod looks stupid

Read full topic

item.title: Coolest Mods
item.dc:creator: rorriMAesU
item.description:
You are being way too critical. Maybe you feel you have something to defend but I think you need to relax.

If replacing textures versus improving/maintaining the originals disqualifies this as a mod and makes CM a remake, than you are correct. Maybe I should not have posted in this thread, I did not realize this was the case.

From what I remember, the crossbow in HL projected similar ammo and had a significant zoom. I’d say that’s similar enough, but that is my opinion.

I am sorry, I guess using the word realistic was too specific for you. I do agree with you however, CM/HL2 is not completely realistic like you attempt to describe, but than again no game is…what you are referring to is called a simulator. CM is more realistic than HL2 and less realistic than, for instance, a game like Stalker. Each game is more or less realistic than the other in different regards…but still games, not simulators.

You are acting like a child…please sit in the corner and be quiet while the adults speak.

Read full topic

item.title: Coolest Mods
item.dc:creator: Omega_Absolute
item.description:
omega_absolute:

Shows what you know

was a reference to the following:

rorriMAesU:

improving the textures

they weren’t improved, they were replaced

rorriMAesU:

remove the soul from HL2

kinda kills the point it being a HL2 mod.

rorriMAesU:

I couldn’t believe they implemented the EXACT same crossbow from the original HL.

They are nothing alike.

rorriMAesU:

The accuracy and programming for the pistol, SMG, and pulse rifle is horrible…

You should know that a REAL bullet in REAL LIFE begins to drastically drop off and decrease momentum after about 100 yards. Valve can’t program every bullet to behave like the crossbow bolt as it would be too pc heavy. Considering you were talking about how “realistic” iron sights are, you should be happy that the guns behave the way they do in HL2.

rorriMAesU:

attempting to pick off headshots

lrn2shoot

But you would have known all that had you asked me what I meant instead of crying. The only fool here is you. Welcome to the Black Mesa Forums.

Read full topic

item.title: Coolest Mods
item.dc:creator: rorriMAesU
item.description:
Omega_Absolute:

…I’d rather hear you bitch like a little girl about people who have a different opinion than you.

Everyone is entitled to their opinion and I respect that. I don’t bitch…perhaps you are referring to something similar to this:

Omega_Absolute:

:facepalm:
Shows what you know.

Omega_Absolute:

So your argument is we should get this “excellent” mod, then switch all the options to original if we don’t like them. That way we can play the un-enhanced enhanced HL2!
:retard:

You should just stop posting because you look like a fool.

And yes I agree, Minerva is a good mod.

Read full topic

item.title: Coolest Mods

Minerva. Yeah it’s pretty great.

But I’d rather hear you bitch like a little girl about people who have a different opinion than you.

item.title: Coolest Mods
item.dc:creator: rorriMAesU
item.description:
rorriMAesU:

Thats why they included the option to use the original…or one of the other HD models…

First off, that’s not an argument. Secondly, it wasn’t my fucking suggestion.

Like i said, not only did they include the original Alyx model with the mod, just to please people who might bitch, they also added about a dozen other choices. I really think that is the purpose of the mod…to add choices/changes. Due to that aspect it excels as a mod. Are you just stupid or lack reading comprehension?

I have an idea, if you are not going to say anything important (see your two previous posts), why don’t you at least get on topic and talk about your favorite mod. Let’s hear it…

Read full topic

option to use the original…

rorriMAesU:

the original…

So your argument is we should get this “excellent” mod, then switch all the options to original if we don’t like them. That way we can play the un-enhanced enhanced HL2!

item.title: Coolest Mods
item.dc:creator: rorriMAesU
item.description:
JohnKiller118:

They changed Alyx from a competent, intelligent, realistic, independent woman… into a whore, bscly.1

Thats why they included the option to use the original…or one of the other HD models. Good job complaining for nothing:

Oh and also, Im looking forward to Ivan’ Secrets and The Mortewood Plaza.

and last but not least, new freemans mind in case anyone is interested.

item.title: Coolest Mods
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
Solitude looks pretty awesome. Anyone that likes Halo and isn’t afraid of custom firmware for the PSP (then again, they’re also making a PC version, so…), you should keep an eye on it.

Our very own Xalener is working on the project.

item.title: Coolest Mods
item.dc:creator: rorriMAesU
item.description:
JohnKiller118:

I feel sorry for you if you honestly thing HL2 isn’t one of the best games ever made.:3

I never said HL2 wasn’t one of the best games ever made. I loved HL2, I just had higher expectations for certain aspects of gameplay which, as I mentioned, the cinematic mod addresses. All I said was it isn’t perfect and could use improvement, I think you need to calm down a little.

Read full topic

item.title: Coolest Mods
item.dc:creator: Evanb91
item.description:
JohnKiller118:

I feel sorry for you if you honestly thing HL2 isn’t one of the best games ever made.:3

I agree with both of you. It is one of the best games ever made. However, it is not perfect. There, I hope that leads to a truce between you two.

I don’t have SMOD, but I saw a Let’s Play on Youtube and it looks pretty cool.
